headline: 35% of Warren Buffett's $296 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks
summary: Since Warren Buffett became the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) in 1965, its stock has delivered a compound annual return of 19.8%.  You won't ever see Buffett chasing the latest stock market trend -- not even one as powerful as artificial intelligence (AI).  With that said, three of the existing stocks in Berkshire's $296 billion portfolio of publicly traded securities are integrating AI into their legacy businesses in very unique ways.

headline: Down 14%, Is It Time to Buy This Top Warren Buffett Stock Before 2025?
summary: Given his fantastic track record of compounding capital as the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway, Warren Buffett is an investing legend.  Among the dozens of companies that Buffett owns, there's a top beverage stock that has dropped in recent months and is now trading 14% off its September all-time high.  Berkshire Hathaway and Warren Buffett have held a stake in Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) for about four decades.
